Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Situla
Description: A small bronze situla decorated with scenes. At the top of the vessel are sacred barks, below these are several deities including Isis and Nephthys as well as Min standing before an offering table.The bottom register depicts seated deities and two winged goddesses, the situla terminates in a lotus flower. The work is fine.
